name: Backrooms-173
description:
A short Backrooms-SCP horror game mix. Backrooms like map mixed with SCP-173 as the main enemy. 

READ THIS: This game is a prototype to test out the idea of mixing the backrooms and SCP so it is prone to have many bugs. This game is more of a test project than a game for a bigger upcoming game (backrooms/SCP mulitplayer survival co-op game)

Join my discord to give me feedback Discord

update v1.1.0

baked lighting

added death/win screens

fixed clipping through floor animation

added more clues throughout the maze

added better keypad sfx

lots of other stuff i cant remember off the top of my head
